message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this split reflects the value each of us brings.
Let's be fair and split the money evenly. I think a 50/50 split is the most equitable solution.
Bob, I appreciate the offer of an even split, but I believe my contributions warrant a slightly larger share. This offer still ensures you get a good portion.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe a 50/50 split is the most fair. However, to avoid further negotiation, I'm offering you 45% of the money. I hope we can reach an agreement.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  We both lose out the longer this goes on. I'll accept your previous offer of a 50/50 split.
